That was then, this is now...

Then she should have put the baby up for adoption while she was still in labor! There are just too many alternatives which she could have availed herself to...she could have dropped the baby off at any church, fire or police department or hospital. But no, she chose to leave her as bait for dogs, coyotes or God knows what. Thankfully, baby was found by someone with the sense to see to the welfare of the child. There are simply way too many people out there who are childless and ready and able to give a child a loving, healthy home. There is NO excuse for this. Maybe her mother should have considered birth control, eh?
